00002 #include <printf.h>

00008 MEM_LOC heapAllocateMemory(size_t size, heap_t* heap);

00010 #define HEAP_BASE_PAGES 4
00011 #define MINIMUM_BLOCK_SIZE 100
00012 
00013 size_t mapInitialHeap(MEM_LOC start)
00014 {
00015         MEM_LOC iter = start;
00016         for (iter; iter <= start + PAGE_SIZE * HEAP_BASE_PAGES; iter += PAGE_SIZE)
00017         {
00018                 map(iter, allocateKernelFrame(), PAGE_PRESENT | PAGE_WRITE);
00019         }
00020 
00021         return HEAP_BASE_PAGES * PAGE_SIZE;
00022 }
00023 
00024 void initializeBaseEntry(heap_entry_t* base_entry, size_t heapSizeInBytes)
00025 {
00026         memset(base_entry, 0, sizeof(heap_entry_t));
00027         base_entry->magic = HEAP_MAGIC;
00028         base_entry->size = heapSizeInBytes - sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00029         base_entry->next = 0;
00030         base_entry->prev = 0;
00031 }
00032 
00037 void initializeHeap(heap_t* heap, MEM_LOC address)
00038 {
00039         //Double check the heap ptr is valid
00040         if (heap == 0) return;
00041 
00042         DEBUG_PRINT("Initializing new heap at 0x%x\n", address);
00043 
00044         //Returns the number of bytes the heap allocated on initialization
00045         size_t heapSizeBytes = mapInitialHeap(address);
00046 
00047         DEBUG_PRINT("Assigning base address\n");        
00048 
00049         heap_entry_t* base_entry = address;
00050         initializeBaseEntry(base_entry, heapSizeBytes);
00051 
00052         DEBUG_PRINT("Setting heap->heap_location to address\n");
00053 
00054         heap->heap_location = address;
00055 
00056         return;
00057 }
00058 
00063 void expandHeap(heap_entry_t* last_heap_entry, MEM_LOC heap_end, size_t expansionSize)
00064 {
00065         MEM_LOC iter = heap_end;
00066 
00067         for (iter; iter <= heap_end + (PAGE_SIZE * expansionSize); iter += PAGE_SIZE)
00068         {
00069                 map(iter, allocateKernelFrame(), PAGE_PRESENT | PAGE_WRITE);
00070         }
00071 
00072         //If the last entry is still free
00073         if (last_heap_entry->used == 0)
00074         {
00075                 last_heap_entry->size += (expansionSize * PAGE_SIZE);
00076         }
00077         else //If not. create a new entry and link it too the list
00078         {
00079                 heap_entry_t* new_entry = heap_end;
00080                 memset(new_entry, 0, sizeof(heap_entry_t));
00081                 
00082                 new_entry->magic = HEAP_MAGIC;
00083                 new_entry->used = 0;
00084                 new_entry->prev = last_heap_entry;
00085                 new_entry->next = 0;
00086                 new_entry->size = (expansionSize * PAGE_SIZE) - sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00087 
00088                 last_heap_entry->next = new_entry;
00089         }
00090 
00091         return;
00092 }

00099 MEM_LOC heapAllocateMemory(size_t size, heap_t* heap) 
00100 {
00101         heap_entry_t* iterator = (heap_entry_t*) heap->heap_location;
00102 
00103         //Loop through all heap entrys
00104         while (iterator != 0)
00105         {
00106                 //If it isn't used and its bigger then the size requested
00107                 if ((iterator->used == 0) && (iterator->size >= size))
00108                 {
00109                         heap_entry_t* used_block = iterator;
00110 
00111                         used_block->used = 1;
00112 
00113                         size_t remainder = used_block->size - size; //How much is left over
00114 
00115                         if (remainder > sizeof(heap_entry_t) + MINIMUM_BLOCK_SIZE)
00116                         {
00117                                 //Create a new entry and reduce the size of the original
00118 
00119                                 //The new entry
00120                                 heap_entry_t* new_block = ((MEM_LOC) used_block) + sizeof(heap_entry_t) + size;
00121                                 memset(new_block, 0, sizeof(heap_entry_t));
00122                                 new_block->magic = HEAP_MAGIC;
00123                                 new_block->size = remainder - sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00124                                 new_block->next = used_block->next;
00125                                 new_block->prev = used_block;
00126 
00127 
00128                                 //The used entry
00129                                 used_block->size = size;
00130                                 used_block->next = new_block;
00131                         }
00132                         else
00133                         {
00134                         }
00135 
00136                         MEM_LOC returnLocation = used_block;
00137                         returnLocation += sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00138 
00139                         return returnLocation;
00140                 }
00141                 else
00142                 {
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 iterator = iterator->next;
00146                 
00147         }
00148 
00149         //This bit of code sets iterator to the last valid entry on the heap
00150         iterator = (heap_entry_t*) heap->heap_location;
00151 
00152         for (;;)
00153         {
00154                 if (iterator->next == 0) break;
00155                 iterator = iterator->next;
00156         }
00157 
00158         //This bit finds the end of the heap
00159         MEM_LOC heap_end = iterator;
00160         heap_end += sizeof(heap_entry_t) + iterator->size;
00161 
00162         //Expands the heap by x pages
00163         expandHeap(iterator, heap_end, 2);
00164 
00165         //Recall this function
00166         return heapAllocateMemory(size, heap);
00167 }

00173 void unifyHeapEntry(heap_entry_t* entry)
00174 {
00175 
00176         if (entry->prev != 0)
00177         {
00178 
00179                 if (entry->prev->used == 0)
00180                 {
00181                         //Can unify left
00182                         heap_entry_t* new_entry = entry->prev;
00183                         heap_entry_t* engulfed = entry;
00184 
00185                         //Add the two sizes and we regain one heap_entry_t size of bytes as one header is finito
00186                         new_entry->magic = HEAP_MAGIC;
00187                         new_entry->used = 0;
00188 
00189                         new_entry->size = new_entry->size + engulfed->size + sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00190                         new_entry->next = engulfed->next;
00191 
00192                         //unifyHeapEntry(new_entry);
00193                         return;
00194                 
00195                 }
00196 
00197         }
00198 
00199         if (entry->next != 0)
00200         {
00201 
00202                 if (entry->next->used == 0)
00203                 {
00204                         //Can unify right
00205 
00206                         heap_entry_t* new_entry = entry;
00207                         heap_entry_t* engulfed = entry->next;
00208 
00209                         //Add the two sizes and we regain one heap_entry_t size of bytes as one header is finito
00210                         new_entry->magic = HEAP_MAGIC;
00211                         new_entry->used = 0;
00212                         new_entry->size = new_entry->size + engulfed->size + sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00213                         new_entry->next = engulfed->next;
00214 
00215                         //unifyHeapEntry(new_entry);
00216                         return;
00217                 }
00218 
00219         }
00220 
00221 }

00228 void heapFreeMemory(MEM_LOC address, heap_t* heap)
00229 {
00230         MEM_LOC entry_address = address - sizeof(heap_entry_t);
00231 
00232         heap_entry_t* specificEntry = (heap_entry_t*) entry_address;
00233 
00234         if (specificEntry->magic != HEAP_MAGIC)
00235         {
00236                 DEBUG_PRINT("Entry magic != Heap magic\n");
00237                 PANIC("AHHHH HEAP_MAGIC error\n");
00238         }
00239         else
00240         {
00241                 specificEntry->used = 0;
00242                 //unifyHeapEntry(specificEntry);
00243         }
00244 
00245         return;
00246 }
